line.text: When to the sessions of sweet silent thought
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I summon up remembrance of things past
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I sigh the lack of many a thing I sought
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And with old woes new wail my dear time waste
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then can I drown an eye (unused to flow)
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For precious friends hid in death dateless night
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And weep afresh love long since cancelled woe
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And moan th expense of many a vanished sight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then can I grieve at grievances foregone
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And heavily from woe to woe tell oer
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The sad account of fore-bemoaned moan
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which I new pay as if not paid before
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But if the while I think on thee (dear friend)
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: All losses are restored and sorrows end
